education.title: American Institute of Certified Public Accountants

honors_and_awards.title: Excellerator
honors_and_awards.description: "Excellerator" from TAS for the quarter October to December 2015 - “Excellerator” is an award that recognizes individuals / team who demonstrate excellence in their field of work.

honors_and_awards.title: Kudos
honors_and_awards.description: Individual award for demonstrating a steep learning curve within the first six months of joining.
